treatment.description: Very long-running, with canes 4-6 mm. thick, with scattered slender prickles 3-5 mm. long; leaves soft-tomentulose beneath; primocane-leaves 3-5-foliolate, pilose but glabrate above, densely velvety beneath, the -petiole sparsely glandular to glandless; leaflets tapering to long acuminate tip, the terminal leaflet ovate; flowering branchlets villous and sparsely glandular; flowers 1-6 on nearly erect villous and stipitate-glandular pedicels up to 6 cm. long, the upper pedicels well overtopping the subtending brads; fruit of richest quality, 1.5-2 cm. in diameter.
